channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Weather tracker: Snowfall cuts power in Poland and flooding devastates Sri Lanka
item.description: Temperatures dip to -8.5C in Poland and 250mm of rain falls in 24-hour period across Sri Lanka Temperatures plummeted this week across the eastern hal...

item.title: Ukraine corruption scandal threatens Zelenskyy’s special relationship with top aide
item.description: Police raid at the home of Kyiv’s main peace negotiator is causing shock waves across Ukraine’s political scene The revelations that anti-corruption p...

item.title: Alabama priest leaves clergy after woman alleges ‘private companionship’ beginning when she was 17
item.description: Robert Sullivan’s self-imposed removal comes after accusations he provided financial support in exchange for arrangement which included sex A longtime...

item.title: Business secretary claims workers’ rights bill U-turn doesn’t breach Labour’s manifesto – UK politics live
item.description: Peter Kyle denies unfair dismissal policy U-turn is breach of manifesto pledge but unions and Labour MPs criticise decision In their London Playbook b...

item.title: Ukraine’s anti-corruption authorities search properties linked to Zelenskyy’s chief of staff – Europe live
item.description: Andriy Yermak said authorities given ‘full access’ to his apartment, and that he is cooperating with the officers, with his lawyers present The Europe...

item.title: Search for British man who fell from cruise ship off Tenerife coast
item.description: The Spanish coastguard has been coordinating search and rescue efforts since Thursday morning.

item.title: France to intercept small boats after pressure from UK
item.description: The change in policy comes after Prime Minister Sir Keir Starmer wrote to President Emmanuel Macron.

item.title: Ukraine anti-corruption agents search home of Zelensky's top adviser
item.description: Andriy Yermak has played a crucial role in Ukraine's response to Russia's war and is lead negotiator in peace talks.

item.title: New Old Trafford stadium on 2035 World Cup list
item.description: Manchester United's proposed new Old Trafford stadium is one of 22 venues named in the UK's bid to host the 2035 Women's World Cup.

item.title: Trump says US will pause migration from 'third-world countries'
item.description: The president did not name which countries would be affected, but vowed to remove anyone "not a net asset" to the US.
